attributes.action: Half naked people should not be pointlessly used to advertise products.
attributes.additional_details:
In pretty much all advertisement and media, half naked people (especially women) are used to make a product more appealing.

People within this forever sex-obsessed society think this is harmless, but this brings up three pretty serious issues:
1. It makes women seem inferior. (As you see with jobs, and certain types of jobs)
2. It has created many sex-obsessed generations. (Shallow minded, selfishness from urge)
3. I have also noticed that it has seemed to help create many pedophiles.

I would like everybody in advertisements to be fully dressed and wearing appropriate clothing. (Covering stomach, thighs, back, and chest.)

I would also like for all forms of under wear to advertised only on manikins.
